original_title: Howie Meets the Ghost of Environmental Disasters Yet to Come
overview: Made for CBS' "Save The Planet" Earth Day Special. Howie, having been confronted about his polluting ways, is visited later that night in his dreams by the Ghost of Environmental Disasters Yet to Come. He is then taken through time to see what havoc man wrought upon the world.
title: Howie Meets the Ghost of Environmental Disasters Yet to Come
